column4: Can anyone give me a hand with installing nvidia drivers ? it keeps telling me to switch back and forth between init 1 an d3 and gets no where
Can anyone give me a hand with installing nvidia drivers ? it keeps telling me to switch back and forth between init 1 an d3 and gets no where
it sucked
Does anyone else have a problem opening .zip files in ubuntu ? ...
well i've downloaded several different .zip files and i cant open a single one. Is ARK the only program available for opening .zip files? :\
unzip:  cannot find zipfile directory in one of WoW-2.0.0-enUS-Installer.zip or
WoW-2.0.0-enUS-Installer.zip.zip, and cannot find WoW-2.0.0-enUS-Install
do a "file filename" on your zip files to see what file type they are
i use KDE
file will tell
WoW-2.0.0-enUS-Installer.zip: 7-zip archive data, version 0.2
Predaeus, any ideas? :\

not sure if file roller or the kde equivalent should handle this by default, else try  package      p7zip-full - 7-Zip is a file archiver with high compression ratio    might be able to unzip this aswell
Predaeus, p7zip = a program ? sorry im kinda new to all this
it is a package not sure what the program inside is called.
Predaeus i have the package now via apt-get, how do i specify that program to open it rather than "unzip" ?

open the Add/remove application and search for p7zip and install it then look for an application entry or try    p7<tab>  in a console to see to what application name it completes, then do "man applicationname" to see how you need to use it.
7z -e <filename> look about right ?
if -e means extract it is probably right yes
I did not read the manpages though.
